How to Join?

Make a purchase on FunPay
1
Every 100 RUB earns you 1 ticket — the more you spend, the better your chances of scoring awesome loot. You can collect up to 50 tickets total.
Let’s go shopping
Stack your tickets
2
Each ticket is a chance to win.
Yes, you can win multiple prizes. Because why not?
Need more tickets!
Watch the draw live stream
3
On September 16, we’ll spin the loot drum live on Twitch and draw the winners.
Tune in so you don’t miss the action!
Follow us on Twitch
Note: Only purchases made between August 15 and September 15 are eligible for participation. Shop on FunPay and loot away!

Questions?

Where can I read the full rules?
You can find the full rules here.
Didn’t get your tickets after the purchase?
Something went wrong. Contact support — they’ll help you get your missing tickets.
Purchases in what currencies are eligible for participation?
Purchases with any currencies are eligible for participation.
I bought something but didn’t know about the event. Will I still get tickets?
You bet! All purchases between August 15 — September 15 count. Just click «Join» on the Loottery page and we’ll add your tickets.
From which country can I participate?
You can participate from any country.
I won! Who do I contact to claim the prize?
Congrats! If you win, we’ll DM you on FunPay to arrange your delivery.
No need to reach us.
My order got canceled. Do I still keep the tickets?
Nope. Tickets from canceled orders will be revoked and won’t count in the draw.
